Class PhotoFacade

java.lang.Object
fr.polytech.picknpic.bl.facades.photo.PhotoFacade
public class PhotoFacade extends Object
Facade for managing photo-related operations in the application. Provides an abstraction layer between the business logic and the data access layer. Implements the Singleton design pattern.

    • getPhotoFacadeInstance

      public static PhotoFacade getPhotoFacadeInstance()
      Retrieves the singleton instance of the PhotoFacade.
      Returns:
      The singleton instance of PhotoFacade.

    • getAllPhotos

      public List<Photo> getAllPhotos()
      Retrieves all photos from the database.
      Returns:
      A list of all photos.

    • getPhotoById

      public Photo getPhotoById(int photoId)
      Retrieves a photo by its ID.
      Parameters:
      photoId - The ID of the photo to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The photo object corresponding to the given ID.

    • publishPhoto

      public void publishPhoto(String title, String description, int price, String url, int currentUserId, boolean isForSale, boolean isForSubscribersOnly, int nbLikes)
      Publishes a new photo to the database.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the photo.
      description - The description of the photo.
      price - The price of the photo.
      url - The url of the photo.
      currentUserId - The ID of the user uploading the photo.
      isForSale - Indicates if the photo is for sale.
      isForSubscribersOnly - Indicates if the photo is for subscribers only.
      nbLikes - The initial number of likes for the photo.

    • updatePhoto

      public void updatePhoto(int photoId, String title, String description, int price, String url)
      Updates an existing photo in the database.
      Parameters:
      photoId - The ID of the photo to update.
      title - The updated title of the photo.
      description - The updated description of the photo.
      price - The updated price of the photo.
      url - The updated file path of the photo.

    • deletePhoto

      public void deletePhoto(int photoId)
      Deletes a photo from the database by its ID.
      Parameters:
      photoId - The ID of the photo to delete.

    • getAllPhotosByUserId

      public List<Photo> getAllPhotosByUserId(int userId)
      Retrieves all photos for a specific user by their ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose photos are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A list of photos uploaded by the specified user.
